## Describe the bug
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## To Reproduce
Input JSON that causes the issue:
```json
{
  "example": "data"
}
```

Command used:
```bash
json-converter input.json --format <format>
```

## Expected behavior
What you expected to happen.

## Actual behavior
What actually happened.

## Environment
- Node version: [e.g. 20.0.0]
- OS: [e.g. macOS, Linux, Windows]
- json-converter version: [e.g. 1.0.0]
